ccre.channel

Class BooleanStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • ccre.channel.BooleanStatus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BooleanInput, BooleanInputPoll, BooleanOutput

    public class BooleanStatus
extends java.lang.Object
implements BooleanOutput, BooleanInput
    A virtual node that is both a BooleanOutput and a BooleanInput. You can modify its value, read its value, and subscribe to changes in its value. BooleanStatus also provides a number of useful helper functions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BooleanStatus()
      Create a new BooleanStatus with the value of false.
      BooleanStatus(boolean default_)
      Create a new BooleanStatus with a specified value.
      BooleanStatus(BooleanOutput... targets)
      Create a new BooleanStatus with the value of false that automatically updates all of the specified BooleanOutputs with the current state of this BooleanStatus.
      BooleanStatus(BooleanOutput target)
      Create a new BooleanStatus with the value of false that automatically updates the specified BooleanOutput with the current state of this BooleanStatus.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean get()
      Get the current state of this boolean input.
      EventOutput getSetFalseEvent()
      Get an EventConsumer that, when fired, will set the state to false.
      EventOutput getSetTrueEvent()
      Get an EventConsumer that, when fired, will set the state to true.
      EventOutput getToggleEvent()
      Get an EventConsumer that, when fired, will toggle the state.
      void send(BooleanOutput output)
      Subscribe to changes in this boolean input's value.
      void set(boolean value)
      Set the boolean value of this output.
      void setFalseWhen(EventInput event)
      When the specified event occurs, set the status to false.
      void setTrueWhen(EventInput event)
      When the specified event occurs, set the status to true.
      void toggleWhen(EventInput event)
      When the specified event occurs, toggle the status.
      void unsend(BooleanOutput output)
      Unsubscribe from changes in this boolean input's value.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BooleanStatus

        public BooleanStatus()
        Create a new BooleanStatus with the value of false.

      • BooleanStatus

        public BooleanStatus(boolean default_)
        Create a new BooleanStatus with a specified value.
        Parameters:
        default_ - The default value.

      • BooleanStatus

        public BooleanStatus(BooleanOutput target)
        Create a new BooleanStatus with the value of false that automatically updates the specified BooleanOutput with the current state of this BooleanStatus. This is the same as creating a new BooleanStatus and then adding the BooleanOutput as a target.
        Parameters:
        target - The BooleanOutput to automatically update.
        See Also:
        send(ccre.channel.BooleanOutput)

      • BooleanStatus

        public BooleanStatus(BooleanOutput... targets)
        Create a new BooleanStatus with the value of false that automatically updates all of the specified BooleanOutputs with the current state of this BooleanStatus. This is the same as creating a new BooleanStatus and then adding all of the BooleanOutputs as targets.
        Parameters:
        targets - The BooleanOutputs to automatically update.
        See Also:
        send(ccre.channel.BooleanOutput)

      • set

        public final void set(boolean value)
        Description copied from interface: BooleanOutput
        Set the boolean value of this output. In other words, turn it on or off.
        Specified by:
        set in interface BooleanOutput
        Parameters:
        value - The new value to send to this output.

      • get

        public final boolean get()
        Description copied from interface: BooleanInputPoll
        Get the current state of this boolean input.
        Specified by:
        get in interface BooleanInputPoll
        Returns:
        The current value.

      • send

        public void send(BooleanOutput output)
        Description copied from interface: BooleanInput
        Subscribe to changes in this boolean input's value. The boolean output will be modified whenever the value of this input changes. If available, the current value of the input will be written at this time.
        Specified by:
        send in interface BooleanInput
        Parameters:
        output - The boolean output to notify when the value changes.
        See Also:
        BooleanOutput.set(boolean), BooleanInput.unsend(ccre.channel.BooleanOutput)

      • unsend

        public void unsend(BooleanOutput output)
        Description copied from interface: BooleanInput
        Unsubscribe from changes in this boolean input's value. This reverses the actions of a previous send call.
        Specified by:
        unsend in interface BooleanInput
        Parameters:
        output - The output to unsubscribe.
        See Also:
        BooleanInput.send(ccre.channel.BooleanOutput)
